= Source code =

== PHP ==
*Hello World:* `index.php`
{{{
<?php
echo '<p>Hello World</p>';
}}}

*Pi calculation:*
{{{
<?php

$x = 3;
$pocetKroku = 1000000;
$pi = (1 - 1 / $x);

for ($i = 0; $i < $pocetKroku; $i++) {
	$x += 2;
	if ($i % 2) {
		$pi -= 1/$x;
	} else {
		$pi += 1/$x;
	}
}

$pi *= 4;
echo "Pi = ". $pi;
}}}

== Node JS ==
*Hello world:* `hello-world.js`
{{{
var sys = require('sys'),
http = require('http');

http.createServer(function(req, res) {
  res.writeHead(200, {
    'Server': 'nodeJS',
    'Content-Type': 'text/html',
    'Content-Length': '18',
    'Connection': 'close',
  });
  res.write('<p>Hello World</p>');
  res.end();
}).listen(8080);
}}}

*Pi calculation:*
{{{
var sys = require('sys'),
http = require('http');

http.createServer(function(req, res) {
  res.writeHead(200, {
    'Server': 'nodeJS',
    'Content-Type': 'text/html',
    'Content-Length': '18',
    'Connection': 'close',
  });

  var x = 3;
  var pocetKroku = 100000;
  var pi = (1 - 1 / x);

  for (var i = 0; i < pocetKroku; i++) {
    x += 2;
    if (i % 2) {
      pi -= 1/x;
    } else {
      pi += 1/x;
    }
  }
  pi *= 4;
  res.write('Pi = '+ pi);
  res.end();
}).listen(8080);
}}}

Run:
{{{
node hello-world.js
}}}
